data.address: Description Sr No 2 Property In The Name Of Mr. Ravi Kumar Chopra S/O Sh. Nand Lal, Residential Property Situated In Street No. 06 %, Deep Vihar Colony, Indu Bihar Colony, Near Sujan Sweets, Pharma Road, Ludhiana. Constructed On A Plot Measuring 100 Sq. Yards In The Revenue Estate Of Pharma, Distt. Ludhiana. Sale Deed Registered Vide Vasika No. 21940 Dated 16.03.2006. Boundaries: As Per Sale Deed: East- Neighbour,West- Neighbour, North- Neighbour, South- Street 20' Wide. As Per Site: East-House, West-House, North-Plot Of Jagdish, South-Street 20' Wide. Possession Type: Symbolic Province/State : Punjab City/Town : Ludhiana Area/Town : Phamra
